Enaam Elgretly, nke a na-akpọkwa Inaam El Gretly, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Enaam Elgretly na Cairo, ọ bụkwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ahlam Elgretry
N'afọ 1966, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọakwụkwọ Institute of Dramatic Art
N'oge ọrụ na-agafe ọkara narị afọ, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ usoro TV na ihe nkiri
Nke a ma ama bụ usoro nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị isii (راجل ост ستات), nke ọ pụtara mgbe akụkụ nke atọ nke usoro ahụ gasịrị.
